Mode.name: VS
Mode.Description: Vertical Speed (V/S) mode allows the pilot to command a specific climb or descent rate in feet per minute. The aircraft maintains the selected vertical speed until reaching the target altitude or until another vertical mode is selected.
Mode.Activation: Activated by pulling the Vertical Speed selector knob. Requires a valid vertical speed input such as +1200 ft/min or -800 ft/min.
Mode.Behavior: The aircraft adjusts pitch to maintain the selected vertical speed. Airspeed may vary unless autothrust or selected speed mode is engaged. When approaching the selected altitude, the system transitions to ALT* for altitude capture.
